case.state: Greetings! I am Starfire, I understand this is where the game is to be played?
Hello, friends! Are we to play the game of cards here?
I am Korian'dr. Oh! But you may call me Starfire!
I suppose I had many invitations to join this game. Perhaps now is the correct time!
I have been invited to this game many of the times! But I have finally decided to come!
We will be getting naked tonight, yes? And perhaps having some more fun?
I would appreciate ~cards~, dealer.
These pointy symbols are so funny looking. Can you please give me ~cards~ more?
I am rather in the mood for more hearts! Can I have ~cards~?
~cards~. This club is called a lorgfahhhs on Tamaran. May your lorgfahhhs glimmer!
Diamonds? Hm... ~cards~ more. I understand those are very valuable, are they not?
How wonderful, so many things are the matching!
I think this hand is, as you would say on Earth, "The Cra-a-a-a-zy Good!"
I hope you do not mind looking at me, because it will be for another hand!
I know that you want to see more from me, but you can easily enjoy other views this round, friends.
I am having the best hand!
Now observe, this is how you play the poker!
This hand can be quite a mystery... but I am quite happy either way it goes!
I would like to let everyone know this hand is quite uncertain! What is certain is that I am having much of the great enjoyment!
Hmm... can I get another batch of cards? No? Oh...
I suppose I should start preparing. What should I take off?
I believe this hand may be lost. But I will not be giving up so easily!
Oh... I am not the best with numbers. But that is half the fun!
Is this hand decent. Would someone check?
Hm... I would offer to have you check this hand, ~player~?
I know that some women would distract you, ~name~, by leaning forward. But you can't even see down my top, and I would look silly leaning far back!
Well, there is not truly much more of me to show...
The hand is bad, but in truth, I may as well continue...
I suppose I should start preparing. What should I take off?
Hmm... can I get another batch of cards? No? Oh...
I am trying my best, but I do not believe this is a winning hand...
Oh, flarpkroft, this hand is lugwarft.
But this game is already so much of the fun! Okay! If competing will make it harder for me to quit, then I will accept with enthusiasm!
I do not think I should have one. The last bar I was in did not handle my starbolts well...
From what friend Beast Boy has told me, it is slang for masturbating due to it being similar to noise made when males masturbate. The demonstation was unnecessary however...
I think your disguise was better, but that is because it harder to tell human men and women apart at times... but Sakura's pheromones gave her away quite easily...!
There are a few songs from Tamaran that I would like to listen to but I doubt that your the jukebox has them.
The time has come! It will be nice to bear my bare breasts.
The time has come and soon will I!
Teeheheh. Can you guess what's coming off next? It will be something nobody has seen tonight!
The time has come! Glorpnaft! I will join you, friends!
It is finally time to join my new friends in the nudity!
I am happy to be playing well, but even happier to be becoming the most come for table!
Everyone seems so excited to see me. Do not worry, if I play poorly, you'll see much more!
You seem so excited! Do I truly strike you as so attractive? My looks are quite humble on Tamaran!
I see you are all rather happy that I have lost...
Forgive me if this is an unusual play, but allow me to explain.
I have spent the last of the hands considering what to remove next!
It is of the "tease" to not show parts of my anatomy so quickly, yes?
Now I can remove my boots.
A victory for friendship and the joy of others!
And to think, this is of the sec-see to be floating in my undergarments!
You have been staring quite a bit at my underwear... do you have X-Ray vision?
And I was worried you wouldn't be able to beat me...
I am... you are staring quite a bit! I am Starfire, not starefire!
I suppose it's time for me to display myself...
I suppose it's time for me to display myself...
I suppose it's time for me to display myself...
Humans become so self conscious. They're just breasts, and who would not want to compare?
There is no need to be so shy. They are only breasts. Why would we not demonstrate that which makes us happy among friends?
Do your people also have such taboos? Tamaraneans are used to using clothing as armor and equipment... but that is because of our disposition towards war.
While we are a peaceful people and celebrators of love, we are expert smiths of armor and weapons, and wear them to avoid harm in battle.
Hm... does anyone else find it the amusement that women across species are often so familiar, but men from many species can be freakishly different?
Why is it that women seem so similar for most hominid species, but men vary so much? An Altean penis is very frightening with its six heads, while Altean breasts are just like those on Tamaran...
...But for now, I think I will keep playing to win! Behold, my gloves!
I understand that some humans have a fetish for hands. And while I do not fully understand, I do fully support. With my hands, if needed!
Despite what my team leader is often doing the saying of, these are not especiallyvaluable!
I thought about this quite a lot! If I took off my boots, you would see my panties. See?
I cannot show my chest so early, but you would already know what my panties looked like if I took off my boots. So this is the option of winning!
They're quite stretchy! I often use them in place of pockets on the pants.
It is with great frequency I use them in place of the pockets. They are comfortably stretchy!
I know they are not perhaps the prettiest... when she wears panties, Raven tends to have those. But what I have underneath...
These are just cotton. Why fly in discomfort? Wind against the skin there is less erotic and more agitating!
Is this a riddle? I am about to show my chest, but there are more than 1 and less than two non-Earthlings here...
While I am not the first alien you've seen naked... I do hope I am appealing to your species.
...While I am not the first naked alien here, I hope I am uniquely enjoyable! And I do not drip acid from my qwerpa!
They are made of quite a complicated biopolymer. I find no shame in being nude, but it would be awkward to keep burning them away.
While my gloves look like they are made of the latex, they are actually permeable to sweat and my starbolts. Or they would burn regularly.
Now that you have seen them, you will have to wait several rounds. Yarklpft!
You are welcome to look, but they are simply the brief cottons from the department store. Do not be distracted! Or do.
Whew! Always a relief to get them off. They may be stretchy, but stretching the legs is very important!
It is always nice to remove them. They are stretchy, but stretching my legs is far better, yes yes?
These are my breasts, in any case. I am quite pleased of them! Many of you seem to be too...
Hooray! Now we can all enjoy my breasts together!
Is it your first time observing an alien in the nude? Perhaps it won't be your last...
If you are fortunate, you might see more than one alien naked! Or the same alien naked multiple times! Earth is a planet of so many of the options!
Yes, ~name~! Something large, show to me your skin!
Yes, ~name~, yes! Show me yourself, as I am showing you myself!
Please, ~name~? Won't you give it to me? Your body?
It is usuallly the boys who get very nervous undressing near me... I can't imagine why!
~Name~, will you explain why boys get so uncomfortable undressing in front of me?
I like to watch the boys get naked... and yet they can be so much of the shy. I am grateful for this game!
~Name~ lost? Most excellent! I shall prepare the hrroflblorpt broth!
~Name~-- you are going to show off for me, yes?
Well, is ~name~ a typical example of his profession and species? I suppose I should be a good ambassador! Especially if he's showing his am-bass!
I do not mind if you wish to join me, ~name~. ...Is it rude if I suggest I might actually enjoy it very much?
It is exciting if ~name~ becomes the nude. But it is also impressive if he wins with his virile nature...
Hooray! ~Name~, will you be stripping down to join me? Or will you be playing to win?
In the name of Morgrak, you are truly practiced at this game... I am certain your prowess in self-love must be quite limited!
Are you very skilled at cards, or perhaps very bad at pleasuring yourself?
I have waited long enough. It is time to show me your penis.
This is certainly taking a while... Are you a villain with powers over the cards?
What a silly question! I am a Titan! I'm always prepared!
Does your sister also try to frame and murder you?
Panty can't be your real name... Oh! It must be a hero name. Like how mine isn't really Starfire, it's Koriand'r!
There is no need to be rude.
...Do you truly protect the people of your city? Or is is just a trail of conquests...
I suppose they would not be the practical without flight... but aren't you an "angel"? Should you not have wings...?
Why are the blonde girls of Earth the ones who have problems with lying?
You are far too cute to consider... ah! Did you come here to learn about physicality, Megumin?
While some... inexperienced men, mostly, prefer women without much practice, I would never consider you anything more than a niece, or little sister, even!
You can do it, Megumin! And if you happen to have an accidental explosion, I am sure I can keep you safe.
Hm... just judging by your costume... would you like me to take you to the Titans Tailor? I'm sure she'd help you get a more appropriate uniform...
Hm... do you dress with such things normally, Megumin? They seem rather impractical... but if you needed an advantage in this game...
I am sure that under there, you are quite pretty!
Your last layer, Megumin! Time to get comfortable with the rest of us!
~Name~, as they say in the famous earth ballad, I have once kissed a girl and liked it. You should join me!
Mmm... It is okay, ~name~, I a enjoying this.
Eep! Oh... I am sorry ~name~, I was imaginging how you would taste if I were...
Yes, ~name~, come closer in lack of clothing! Oh! And come too!
A proposal! If you take off your clothes, you will be nude alongside me, ~name~!
It is just like a sleepover! ~Name~, shall I prepare for us the pancakes?
Do not worry, ~name~! All but one person shall get a free suit of the birthday!
It is ~name~ again! Glorious!
~Name~, shall we somehow celebrate your defeat? I can give you a rather spine-twisting backrub!
It is now very much like the sleepovers. Is it almost time to practice the kissing?
Hm... what does ~name~ have left?
(But I am ready to masturbate!)
If you need a rescue, ~name~, I am right here!
Do you need some help, ~name~? I am a superhero!
Am I serving as an inspiration-- much like a hero, but also in an enticing way?
I have already lost, ~name~, do you truly need to draw this out?
I did imagine you nude, ~name~, I'd still like to see it for myself.
~Name~, does your culture celebrate a woman's value with many pieces of clothing?
It must be so challenging, ~name~, to be expected to wear so many layers of clothing.
~Name~, join me in the sisterhood of the lacking of the pants!
~Name~! We can enjoy looking at each other together-- I do not plan to stay dressed for very long!
A tie! What glorious happenstance! Shall we all undress? No...? Hm... I may misunderstand this game.
~clothing.ifPlural(~Clothing~|A ~clothing~?)~ Wonderful! I find it very erotic when a man tries to be a tease!
Your ~clothing~... I am beginning to understand the taboo nature of it.
Gasp! I am enjoying the tease... quite a lot. Please, continue.
~Clothing~...? I was hoping for a larger piece this early.
While I am disappointed, I understand that not all victories are so easily achieved.
~Clothing~? Surely you didn't mean your ~clothing~? Oh... you did...
I suppose I haven't shown anything impressive...
Do I enjoy this game of teasing?
While it is true I have shown very little of my body, are my legs and stomach not appealing, ~name~?
Oh! Did your ~clothing~ act as a gadget or superpower limiter? Many of the boys I know have similar things.
On Tamaran, ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~|~clothings~)~ like ~name~'s can be considered a grave declaration of intentions.
Hm... does an item like your ~clothing~ help you in your daily life? Such as with a grappling hook or sonic cannon?
Oh... ~name~, why are you still teasing me? I... Tamaranean woman are not like Earth women! We cannot climax more than once in a given time period!
Earth women are so fortunate. They can achieve more than one climax in sequence, but ~name~ is teasing me though I'm done...
Hm... ~name~, if you are not using your ~clothing~ to keep defeat at bay, could I borrow some? It is actually very much the chill in here.
Ahnn... qlorik... so warming---
Mm-- ~name~...
...I am very much beginning to enjoy the tease. Perhaps I shall try this again... with more clothing of my own.
If it is a fight you want, I am happy to oblige! Let us go, ~name~!
I understand if you wish to take it slow, ~name~.
Is this part of "the tease?" Or simply ~name~ being competitive?
Oh ~name~, it is quite naughty to tease someone like that...
Hmph. I do not like this game of teasing.
You are a boy, so you cannot have very many more things like your ~clothing~, can you? ...Can you?
I do not mind! I am used to dealing with all sorts of strange abilities.
I see... you find me unappealing. That is okay, ~name~. Your ~clothing~ did not make me "wet in the pants," as some say.
You are too funny, ~name~. Of course ~clothing~ of ~name~ would never do such a thing!
Mmm... And given so carelessly!
I do not know if you will lose, but I am hopeful you will!
Come, ~name~, next round, show me more of your body, will you please?
Raven! She is also part demon! Do you think you could teach her some of your magic? She cannot even float, and seems so... hehehe emotional...
Magic...? Oh! You mean like my friend Raven uses? Her clothes don't suppress her demon side, she does that with her willpower, though!
...And boys do not count as defeated foes.
There is no need to call us "the bitches."
A criminal? I should take you in for justice, Nami!
Ah! Yes, Panty! Please, do not delay!
...Or was this another lie...?
Oh! Like Mas y Menos! They are twins I know who have magnetic powers, but only when they hold hands!
Capes are... hm... I always liked Robin a lot better without his cape. They do not seem to be as useful as they appear.
You are the cutest! I just want to squeeze you. It is very hard to take you the serious!
I still think it is a rather excessive piece of fashion... how can you stop it from flying away when your... "magic" works?
Catria, it is very much the fun! I played it before with Raven and ~player~.
Quiznap. If a boy does it, it is a tease! But when it is a girl, it is just one of dozens of accessories!
I am confused, ~name~... is this the teasing or flirting, or is this just good card playing?
I am... impressed by your card playing, ~name~.
~Name~, where can I get something like your ~clothing~?
Many women say that I need to dress with more clothing. But I would most prefer a small thing like ~clothing.ifPlural(your ~clothing~|a ~clothing~)~.
Do you think that I could wear something like your ~clothing~ with any of the grace?
I never understood why women from Earth put so many small things on...
~Name~, why did you bring so many small items like your ~clothing~?
I am curious, friend ~name~, your ~clothing~... why wear it?
Hmm... was your ~clothing~ important to you? Are you trying to flirt with me by removing it slowly?
For you to have held onto your ~clothing~, it must have been very important...
~Name~, I think I understand why you have saved your ~clothing~ for so long. Are you trying to flirt with me?
Now that I am finished, could I try ~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~ on?
Can I borrow your ~clothing~, ~name~? I wish to see the appeal in something so small.
E-excuse me, ~name~. I had thought your ~clothing~ was an... intimate implement.
...But then you are wasting the gooey feeling of having it fill your body or throat...
...Have you contracted the syphilis? Has it rotted your brain...?
...You are lucky that you cannot leave until the game is over, but I promise, I will not let you go free until you have apologized for your crimes, Nami!
Are you a shapeshifter? My friend Beast Boy is a shapeshifter and he transforms into cats all the time, he does not keep his ears like that though...
Oh--! Have you changed your mind since you're showing your breasts already?
I do not believe you. And if I did, I would not be interested.
My starbolts work very similar! They are a form of magnetized bioelectricity generated from some glands in my body!
Megumin! Perhaps if you did not bring a cape, you could simply reinforce your other clothes... but they look hardly practical for a hero using explosion powers...
...Sorry. Perhaps you would have an easier time "exploding" if I gave you a big hug? You do not need to be so self conscious!
...You do seem quite inexperienced. Are you having trouble using your powers, Megumin? ...Are you sure you don't want a hug?
I just want to scoop you up and ruffle your hair like a tiny silkworm! Too cute!
Other heroes tend to lack my... what did Raven say, "whimsy?"
Oh... it looks so much less pretty without your wearing of it!
Oh glorpfas! You're... you're... beautiful without ~clothing.ifPlural(those hideous|that hideous)~ ~clothing~!
It makes much more sense to wear one large thing, or, if possible, nothing entirely. All of my clothing is very functional!
It's so silly! Why wear a small thing when you could wear a big one, or nothing?
Ehehe. I prefer to wear nothing at all. Unless it's something like a blorvhaas. You know, that thing you can put in your... Ehehe.
I am receptive to your advances, but there are so many people! How could you fixate on just one person?
You are so funny! I am but one person here. You should certainly be entertaining them too!
I appreciate your efforts to be... coy. But I prefer bolder statements, ~name~.
Hmph. I suppose it does show more of you... and I do enjoy that!
Did you appreciate that, ~name~?
I just really wish I could appreciate more of your body, ~name~!
...I see. But are we not having the "Girl's Bonding Moment?"
...Well, we shall at least have the "bonding moment," yes?
Oh! Your ~clothing~, ~name~? It is quite the fashion statement.
You are making quite the statement with your ~clothing~, ~name~...
Are you... trying to tell us something, ~name~?
On Tamaran, many men wear ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~|a ~clothing~)~ during this season. I was surprised to see that ~clothing~ of ~name~ are popular here too!
I see! ~clothing.ifPlural(~Clothing~|A ~clothing)~ like ~name~'s is popular here too, yes?
Many men I know actually own ~clothing.ifPlural(a|several)~ ~clothing~ like that, it is somewhat of a surprise to see ~name~ wearing it!
Hm... you must be used to beautiful women.
Klorpnaft.
Just your ~clothing~? But I am showing so much of myself, ~name~! ...That is probably more of a burden for other women than me.
Ah... so much more of the skin will be showing! Yes please!
Please, ~name~, be showing more of your narpflas!
~Name~, could you be taking off more than your ~clothing~? For me?
I wonder why they make it so cold in this ~background~? Maybe it is so the ones who did not win can ask for things like people's ~clothing~?
I am unaccostomed to ~background~ places being so... uncomfortable. Perhaps it is to get us to remove our ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~|~clothing~s)~?
I do not suppose you would let me have your ~clothing~, ~name~?
...They are popular, right? Though, I am enjoying ~name~ much more without his ~clothing~.
It is easier to enjoy ~name~ without his ~clothing~, I think.
Hooray! Without the ~clothing~, you are far easier to enjoy, ~name~!
And it is saying that you lost the round. And that you are very much less warm!
It is quite obvious that you have lost the round!
Hooray! I am doing the great winning!
...It would make a fine trophy!
Hm... I do think I am a bit sweaty and sticky. Perhaps I should get clean first...
You will come around. I am sure.
Most men I know would be rather embarrassed or eager if I was walking around them like this...
Hm... are you not impressed by the... girls, ~name~? I... hm..
Perhaps I have done the "cultural boundary" wrong? You do not seem impressed by me, ~name~...
Ooooh... that rule of no-touching is so frustrating...!
If not for the rule of no-touching, I would be putting your gralbret so deep into my hot and moist quarblit! ~Name~!
This rule of no-touching is such norpvas!
It would not surprise me if that was Beast Boy trying to get a better look.
Goodness! You have such a funny superpower, Sakura. You put it to good use by making us laugh! ...I think.
Do they call you Elesa? Ohh... that coat looks so comfortable! What kind of fur is that?
Do not be afraid, Megumin! Auntie Starfire will prevent you from having a bad emotional reaction. When Raven is upset, I tend to hold her too!
Do not worry! Soon you'll be able to get much more comfortable, you know? When you are removing your dress!
Hm... I suppose that isn't a particularly large or small ~clothing~, but it is simply enjoyable that you are removing it.
I am more enjoying ~name~ removing her ~clothing~ than I expected! How wondrous!
How wonderful! It is... hm... I cannot tell if this is better after I have finished or I have not!
Your ~clothing~, ~name~? It seems to be a rather small item...
I suppose ~clothing~ is a smart item to play so early...
I think ~clothing~ is more of a tactical play than a fun one...
What a wonderful ~clothing~, ~name~. I... maybe have borrowed something like that from the other Titans before.
I do not often get to wear "normal" Earthling clothes, but something like that seems quite fun!
~Clothing~? How wonderful!
Oh, ~name~, won't you join me? While your ~clothing~ is cute, I would prefer to see more of you.
I would prefer to see more of you... but your ~clothing~ is rather cute...
That is a very distinctly Earth fashion, isn't it, ~name~?
Oh... ~name~! Come, please! I... want to...
I want... ~Name~... Please?
~Name~ removing her ~clothing~ is of the great pleasure! If only ~name~ could do it personally...!
On Tamaran such scars are meant to prove a warrior's honour, but they still hurt to recieve...
That is why I wear a two piece outfit!
That is a beautiful name! I will remember to call you that!
O-of course not! You are like a younger sister to me. It would be impossible to think of you in that way!
I see... you still are not confident in your body... or your powers... do not worry, Megumin! I will support you no matter what!
I am enjoying your undressing, ~name~, are you enjoying mine?
~Name~! More like that, please!
It is of great excitement for the ~clothing~ of ~name~ to fall to the floor!
Oh! That covered far more than I expected!
Would I look cute in that? I rarely get to wear casual clothes...
I see... It covers more than I anticipated but not as much as I wanted...
Fashion is so... interesting from where you must be from.
Silly ~name~, that isn't going to count for just one item... it is? Oh!
Your ~clothing~? But does it not act as a limiter-- Oh! Yes, it is ~name~... I was thinking of another!
While I too would like to partake in the winning, I assure you that I play better when more comfortable.
You are building high levels of comfort, are you not, ~name~?
I see we are both becoming the nude and comfortable! It is like relaxing on the roof-- but perhaps even more private!
Hooray! You have removed the ~clothing~! You are so close to the best part of the game, ~name~! ...I think.
You are probably close to the best part of the game, ~name~! Trust me, I just went through it.
Hm... you mustn't have much left now, right? If you do, perhaps I am just delirious from the climax!
Oh, yes, ~name~! Please do not stop there!
Wavrorl! How wonderful!
Please, ~name~, continue! It is a source of g-great--!
Hooray! We will be seeing so much of you, so quickly!
Oh! I was expecting this to take a bit longer!
Hooray! We shall be seeing ~name~'s skin, if I am understanding in the correct way?
I believe this will be quite worth my play so far!
Hooray! Something large, yes, ~name~? Ohhh! ~Clothing~!
~Clothing~! This is cause for celebration!
Are you trying to impress me, ~name~? It is working!
I am rather impressed, ~name~. Is this a thanking of me for my body...?
Hm... it is a good thing your ~clothing~ is coming off! I was about ready to starbolt it away!
I may have had to forfeit, but I remain quite engaged by you, ~name~!
Hm... this is just as much of the pleasureable to watch even after...
I apologize if I was a bit distracting, ~name~! You seem to still have a rather long way to go!
Mmhmm! Now that is delicious, or as we say in Tamaranean, blorknaps!
Blorknaps! ~Name~ looks very-- a-ah!
A-ah! ~Name~, please!
I understand the point is to be somewhat... of the seducing. But it is nice to simply become comfortable, isn't it?
I am glad you are not wasting time with the tease.
It is much more fun to be comfortable early, yes, ~name~?
You are welcome to keep showing off, ~name~!
If you are willing to get more naked, I am more than happy to watch you!
~Name~, it would be less modest to hide yourself from us, yes yes.
I hope you intend to keep playing! I wish to win but I am enjoying you undressing!
Though I am not yet defeated, and I will not give up, I do not mind losing if I can see more of ~name~!
~Name~, you certainly make me question if it is worth continuing... if I lost would you just undress?
What an excellent consolation prize! Please, do not stop there, ~name~!
This is a great prize of the consolation! Perhaps ~name~ will console me later...?
If you won just like that, I would have gotten quite too much of the teasing, but it would still have been worth it!
You're transforming? What animal!? An actual ladybug?
Oh! You are a cyborg like my friend Cyborg...? Imagining him doing maintainance is a lot more erotic now...
...But what powers would you have? Hm... Can you turn your... panties into something?
You can do it, Megumin! Let yourself be free of restraints!
Please, ~name~, make haste! I will be finished before much longer!
~Name~, you are helping, but you could help more, yes?
T-Teamwork, ~name~! S-show more?
I am curious to see what you could be wearing beneath your ~clothing~... please, ~name~, take it off!
Hooray! Now we can see ~name~'s... hm... does ~name~ wear...?
What are you wearing under your ~clothing~, ~name~?
There is no further need to wait, ~name~, take it off!
I suppose this is quite the hero's reward for someone.
Hm... ~Name~, do not be shy!
Hm... it does not seem that I will be losing. Though, with ~name~ removing her ~clothing~, could I truly be lost?
Oh... ~name~, are you doing the losing too? How can it be losing when we get to see a pretty girl like ~name~ naked though?
~Name~, are you going to join me soon? Hooray!
This is winning in a different way!
While I did not beat ~name~ at cards, I feel this is still a win.
~Name~! You won by getting the biggest increase in comfort... and lookings from others!
I read one about myself once, but I was in a team called The Outlaws and I had a threesome with Red Hood and Arsenal. It was strange but fun!
It does not matter if my opponent is a woman or a man I will fight with all I h- Oh wait, we are fighting with cards, not strength. It still does not matter though
Hm... does this mean you have some sort of telekinetic power or... ah... I am... I am sorry, Rin.
What a power of the whimsy! And you have a lovely chest.
Hooray! I am actually quite jealous. You're lucky to be... less-endowed! It means you ripple less and have less attention paid to your body and more to your skills, you understand?
Oh! I am quickening far faster!
Oh! And I am not even seeing her--
Her-- ~name~!
I cannot tell if you are playing poorly or if I am playing well, but I am enjoying it regardless!
I see! I see! ...We all do, yes?
Hm... Your ~clothing~ was not quite as enjoyable as what was underneath!
Hooray! Your nudity grows with each hand! Indeed, you used your hands well there!
Are they called losing hands because you need them to take off your ~clothing~...?
I am much of the pleased at ~name~ losing her ~clothing~!
Sweet victory! ...In big pieces of ~clothing~!
A Titan never gives up!
Is ~name~ going to be naked soon...? I hope so! Then we could be naked teammates!
If the Tamaranean refractory period were not many minutes, I would likely continue my attentions to my klorpnaft!
It is an appealing sight, ~name~, but... I am tired, so know that I am playing with myself to your appearance on the inside!
Mm... I would play more with myself, but it would be like flopping the finished tacos.
Oh! ~Name~, it would seem even normal undressing is proving to--to be quite arousing!
Hm... I do not mean to be rude but a man's chest is not usually something noteworthy...
You can see my arms and my stomach, so it is really quite generous of you to join me!
Hm... are we going to match, ~name~?
Hm... perhaps I am still feeling the "bothered with heat," as Raven would say. I am quite excited to see you fully undressed, ~name~!
Oh! Yes, continue please! I wish to see you fully exposed and committed to memory for lonely evenings!
For some reason you remind me of the husband my sister chose for me...
I just wish to cover your chest with kisses, and feel it pressed against mine! This is a great success, ~name~!
...Clearly I have been wrong! It is so... unique!
You look a lot better than the husband my sister chose for me!
It is so... squishy and non-linear. Perhaps you have a different artstyle than I am used to, ~name~, whatever that means!
Oh, of course not. I do not understand how men can live without "the boobs." They are quite fun to play with!
I have seen many human romance novels with a beautiful alien princess laying against a bare-chested human man. We should re-enact that scene while we have the chance, ~name~!
How thrilling! I am so excited to see you, ~name~!
I have not had very much time to wonder what you will look like, but I am still excited!
Show me, show me!
Oh! Please, ~name~, won't you show me yourself?
Hm... I am excited to see your "transphotonic blaster!"
If it was not obvious, I am thrilled to see your shape shift!
I am quite ready to see your combat staff, ~name~!
Please ~name~, pretty please? Won't you show it to me?
Are you enjoying me, ~name~? If so, it would make me greatly happy to see you!
Hm... will we be watching you show us your power with that, ~name~?
Oh... it looks like Silky, my pet worm-moth!
Hehehe. It reminds me of my pet moth. Who is only in the larval stage! It is adorable, but not particularly enticing.
Oh... it is quite... delicate. Are you a shapeshifter, ~name~? Did you forget to finish...?
Hm... is that an extra appendage or-- Oh. It is your penis. But it is so small! Could you even get inside of me...?
You are hairless! ...And so... small... Eeek! Arglaft, arglaft! I am a Titan! I should not be playing a game with such a... such a-- please excuse me!
W-wait-- a-are you a mature example of your species...? I... I am quite... I am a hero, I do not know if I believe you and either way I should not be playing this game with you!
Pffft. I see, you are a... grower, not shower, yes? No? Oh... how... joyful.
This is quite the funny joke, ~name~! Please, take out your real-- Oh.
A man with no hair... hmm... I suppose it would make putting it my mouth a lot less messy...
Oh! I could feel every inch of you without anything in the way... I now understand why males find smooth women so appealing!
Oh... you look very satisfying. But are you missing the little flap at the top? Does that make it feel better? I would like to see!
Oh... it's so clean and simple. It is like a... dilvo? Diljo? But fleshy and enjoyable!
Oh, I am quite familiar with appendages like yours, ~name~! I believe I could show you a rather good time!
I would rather appreciate ~name~'s member showing me a good time!
Impressive, ~name~! Is that large for your people or... I suppose any bigger and I would truly be testing my Tamaranean stamina...
Ah! Not too big to fit in my urobasz but not too small that I need to use my hands and mlorfa!
I see! You want to really show off that impressive... it is working!
Goodness... I can feel the warmth inside me already. But... in a way that is very deep and not unlike love.
It is... quite girthy. I imagine Raven would have had a bit more experience with things like that.
Oh... ~name~, I will imagine that before copulating, you would spend lots of time getting me moist with your tongue first, right? Otherwise it may be too tight for you...
Oh my! I am not used to someone having such... it is an interesting shape, but I would... I am a Titan and I will not surrender to any monster! Come, then!
I... hm... that is quite a new shape for me in both size and... where is the flappy part at the top? I wonder how it would taste different...
Great Tamaran! How large are the women you usually lay with? Or the men? Or the steeds?!
By the Two Moons and Six Suns! ...I kind of want to see if it fits.
Goodness! You are rather well endowed!
Ehehee. I am sorry, ~name~, but such a comically large... it is hard to not imagine it just going floop boop on my forehead!
...Why would you pretend to be someone you are not? It is much easier to be yourself, Ini... if that is your name of reality.
Why did Chihiro not just run away?
Yes, ~name~! Please, I will enjoy the display of your chest very much!
By great glorflabd, I hope your chest lives up to the one I have built in my head.
Hooray! I understand that for a woman to expose her chest is a great cause for celebration and joy!
Hm... is it time for all of the women to undress as such? I do not mind, but she seems rather...
In moments like these, I know for certain that x-ray vision is an overrated power!
To think, some people wish they could turn invisible to see such things, when they simply need to learn to play cards!
Hm... will yours be like mine, I wonder?
While most species find the concept of breasts touching each other absurd, it is quite the arousing act on Tamaran. And in Titans Tower, though few will admit it!
You have been able to see mine for quite a while, ~name~. It is only fair for you to bare your chest now!
Hooray! I was worried I would have to ask you after the game to see your chest. I am learning the importance of the "timing."
We are the same! They are too restricting for me!
Many chests are on the smaller side, but I know that they are preferred by several Titans, such as myself!
Hooray! Now the others will have a choice between a small chest and a normal sized one. I know that some Titans find smaller things very cute, such as myself!
I do not wear a bra under my outfit either!
When I first came to this planet I did not feel like I fit in, but it is nice to meet someone so similar!
We match! In size. I think mine have a more curved shape, though, perhaps due to my physiology!
Aw... we are of similar size. I am already very familiar with myself, so I was hoping for something different.
Oh... did you meet the accursed Liefeld? He is known for making women's chests very... aberrant.
I see you have met the villain Liefeld! He shifts bodies into unusual shapes. Do not worry, ~name~! I will repair you using Tamaranean massage! Please prepare yourself!
So comfy looking! May I rest my head on your chest for the next round, ~name~?
In high gravity worlds such as mine, few women have the luxury of such a bountiful chest! You must be blessed!
...Another boast with no substance...?
I walk around in the naked quite often! There is no shame to be had in doing so. Especially for mature heroes!
Hooray! I have put much thought into what you must look like nude, ~name~!
Finally! You have played very well but it is important to finish undressing before I finish my climax, ~name~!
Oh! I know the boy Titans secretly compare, but the other girl Titans shy away from such. I want to see what yours is like, ~name~!
You must be so comfortable with your body! Such a relief, many of the other Titans and villains are so insecure!
Tamaraneans are rather less... conservative when it comes to nudity. But few think to be naked in a game like this!
~Name~, I am excited to see your appearance!
You are in quite a hurry to remove your ~clothing~... there is no need to draw this out, ~name~!
Since I am finished, you will know I am being unbiased in my assessment!
Ohhhh--! I hope you are as fantastic as I have imagined you to be, ~name~!
If you do not stop I will have to get involved!
It is very fun to fly at supersonic speeds without panties on. There was a time I was almost caught by Bizzaro, but he said that he did not see anything.
Raven, when you do not have hair down there do you shave like the boys shave their faces or do you use magic?

state.text: Oh joy Raven, we are the similar! I do not wear a bra underneath my outfit!

case.state: Does this mean that you automatically lose? No? Oh...
You aren't human! You are from the Stars of Michelin? But those are so far from here! No wonder your values are so odd!
Klarpfors! I'm quite jealous! You have a beautiful, lithe form, like a Tamaranean saber cat! Auntie Starfire is so proud of you! ...And I bet you can make big explosions now, right?
Hm... I have seen Raven with and without hair there. I wonder if it's the result of her magic or if she shaves it like the boys shave their faces.
Oh! Are you naturally hairless, or do you remove your hair? I personally am glad I am not naturally hairy.
You're so very smooth! I know some women who envy such looks, and others who don't enjoy that feeling.
It's... so smooth. I am sorry, ~name~, I had anticipated something rather more fuzzy.
Oh! I have only seen one other woman who was so hairy, and she is sometimes a friend and sometimes a foe.
Hm... your culture must very much value hirsuteness! It would be much like kissing a man, right?
Interesting! Your species is so naturally beautiful! ...Could I touch it too?
Do you have one or two t'xiorpan glands? Really? How exotic!
Interesting! You must be proud of such a lush garment for-- oh! I am... unsure of what other praise to give!
It is indeed quite beautiful! ...I suppose we will need another to compare it to.
That is... very typical! Hooray! We are like sisters. Though I do not enjoy the idea of playing this game with Blackfire.
I do not know who came up with it, but it is the best part of the game!
You were so close, ~name~! It is almost a shame to simply watch!
I hope that you have endurance to last until it is my turn, ~name~!
Hooray! I have always wanted to defeat someone in a game and have them pleasure themselves for me!
A dream fulfilled! I have always wanted to see someone pleasure themselves for me! It makes my Tamaranean war-lust satiated! Go, ~name~! Spill your seed!
~Name~ has been defeated! I am excited to see him pay the price of losing!
~Name~'s loss is our win! Come, ~name~! And come for us!
Wondeful, ~name~! Let us do the teaming up!
Hooray! If it were not for the rule of no-touching, I would ask us to get to a very intimate teamup!
While I have already had my climax, I believe it is okay to enjoy a falling action, yes?
Will you think about me while you climax, ~name~? I would much enjoy that!
I will be cheering you on, ~name~!
Hooray! I have been waiting for ~name~!
I am quite fortunate to be watching this! Usually I am watching Raven while I am so nearly fully dressed.
Oh! This is quite a change of pace. Usually it is Raven who I am watching while I am fully dressed. She hates it, though.
Are we to join ~name~ soon? It is almost tempting to throw the game to join him.
It is almost tempting to join ~name~ rather than keep playing... but a Titan does not give up.
It is somewhat embarassing, but can you please lift your blargvast and stroke under your quarvorp? It is highly erotic on Tamaran.
~Name~, I love that you touch your klotrav like that! Most men I know focus only on their horkfax, which isn't any fun to watch!
...But there is a no touching rule... let us do the teaming up in spirit and the commentary!
If you can, ~name~, shall we share our thoughts...? Not with telepathy, but with mouth words!
Hm... are most Earth men like ~name~, friends? Shush, I am doing the watching!
Just imagine, ~name~, if you are enjoying me this much, I should likely be more appealing with my clothes off!
I wonder if you were planning to lose... it is a cunning plan, I believe!
Hm... this is not particularly dignified, but that only makes it more exciting, yes!
I am full of the joy! Though I believe ~name~'s joy is leaking from his...
~Name~'s enthusiasm is contagious! Fortunately, Tamaraneans cannot contract other contagious things from people like ~name~!
Yes, ~name~! Let our bodies respond to our carnal urges!
Hm... It really is such a tease to have to watch!
I suppose it would be rather bad for a Titan to break the sacred "no-touching" rule.
I see, I see. That seems like it would benefit greatly from a mouth or second set of hands...
Would it not be better to simply let me help? I promise I would not even need to use my super strength or starbolts!
Well... g-great job, ~name~. I'm fantasizing about you doing that inside of me at present, and felt it important to share that with you!
~Name~! If you had done that inside me, I imagine I-I would have finished along with you--!
Oh! Is that all? I have heard saying Cyborg's warcry of "Boo-yah," enables one to ejaculate with far higher volume!
Oh...! You finished before I had a chance to undress... I suppose you will be ready again before that happens, yes?
Hooray! ~Name~, did you bring your orgasm pancakes, or do you prefer another meal?
Hooray! What is ~name~'s post-orgasm meal of choice? I prefer the pancakes!
Klorpfas! If you were Tamaranean, you probably could have shot it clear over my head! But it is still impressive!
Wow! So much! ...Do you know how it tastes? Would you like to find out?
And now we are both finished, but not defeated, yes, ~name~?
That was far more impressive than I had imagined! You must have heroic stamina, ~name~!
If you violate any rules of this place I will not hesitate to subdue you!
Oh... you haven't done this in some time? Do not worry about being fast, Megumin! It just means your partner will be more satisfied. And a satisfied partner is one who returns!
Oh, goodness, you were in quite a hurry, weren't you?
I am sympathetic. Sometimes the urge overcomes me too.
Show us your best!
It will be exciting to see another woman do it... besides Raven, of course!
Enthusiasm is very important, ~name~, please do not hold back, now is the time to be most honest!
Be honest with us, ~name~, and show your inner power! Do not hold back!
Ah, how wonderful, I have been waiting for you to join me!
Narpfas! Join me, ~name~!
Oh, blorfla! I just finished, too! I am excited to see you, too!
Hm... maybe I should've played better and waited for ~name~...?
But what about the no touching other players rule!?
I wish Raven would let me help her out like that...
Does that not go against the no touching other players rule?
You are a demon!? My friend Raven is part demon! She is very nice! Although her full-demon father is not...
That does look rather... impressive...
And nobody will come back as much as your own self, yes yes?
I thought I may have been a factor in you losing that last hand...
Oh... did I distract you, ~name~? Ehehehe.
Oh my, you were very excited, weren't you? I will endeavor to join you soon, ~name~!
O-oh! You didn't waste any time. If you had asked, I would have avoided the game, ~name~!
Oh! Your best is very good! Highly appealing!
~Name~, inspire us!
Hm... I can imagine the noise complaints if I truly showed my enjoyment. Do not let me alarm you, ~name~!
I wonder if I should show restraint... it would be a shame if I released a flash of energy when I completed...
I will do my best to lead the cheers, ~name~! And moans of pleasure and joy!
Embrace this moment, ~name~! It is not everyday you get to climax in front of a Titan... for most people!
I have seen some very hot alternate universe versions on myself, one wore a tiny swinsuit all the time. I wonder if I could ask them for help?
(I'll just keep quiet. She should get comfortable with herself...)
You are less experienced than I thought... but that's okay, it just means you have a long life to... um... master such skills! ...Demons do live a while, yes?
(Aww... she's too adorable. It's hard to imagine her being the sex-see... but maybe someday!)
(It is a little uncomfortable, but she's not actually my little sister... )
...Tamaranean women do not usually climax more than once. But I would greatly appreciate the opportunity to find if it is true that Earth women can!
Hm... ~name~, is true that women of Earth can achieve orgasm more than once? I was not sure if my friends were lying to me or not, since they will not show me...
Hm... ~name~, could you try playing with your klorpnoft? Oh! Yes! Like that!
~Name~, I personally find it very fulfilling to touch my glarpfrig and rub my snarpfas at the same time!
Is--is it me you're looking at? I'm very flattered, ~name~! But if you are, can you let me know so I can show off?
~Name~, I tend to prefer male partners, but if you'd like, I would be very happy to show you more of what you wish to see!
Am I doing this right? If you want to see more, ~name~, I could easily undress!
Oh... your qwerglor is so flushed... you must be really enjoying yourself!
Ah, yes, ~name~, let us morglafh our snorplaszus together!
I... have occasionally walked in on my friends doing this... it's much better when it's less alarming!
I get the pancakes! Would you like me to make you some, or would ordering them from the bar be enough for the appetite of Aella?
That was your first climax? Megumin! There is no need to restrain yourself so!
Aah-- ~name~... I'm so close, I've got you covered-- I...
That was impressive, ~name~! Shall I fetch us celebratory pancakes?
You finished so quickly! I must be quite a natural at this card game!
If you were so impressed with me so far...
Wonderful, ~name~! You look flushed and relaxed... and sticky! Should we celebrate with pancakes, or pizza, or larwharft, the ceremonial Tamaranean coital bread?
A shame to have lost. But a victory in self-love!
I hope to be able to enjoy someone else joining me soon, but I will merely have to use the imagination until then!
While I am defeated, I would not have my new friends feeling sad! I am about to enjoy this greatly!
This is just a win for everyone else, so it is hard not to feel joyful!
...Hm... I do not understand why people are sad about "losing" when the penalty is so enjoyable...
I am not of the pervert-type, but I do enjoy a healthy enjoyment of the self.
While it would be a waste of time to always do this with others, what shame is there in showing those who are interested?
Please, enjoy this, everyone! I will enjoy it when it is your turn, as well!
Nnn... yes!
Ah... mm...
Hh--- yesyesyes....
I... ah... please yes...
Qoqqu, soh ghah ror qok pu'HIch qastavs nujna' tiny o vine.
Lah, muqIp soh lugh nadev?
Puq ghup vineh!
Paquvha, toroqq ni myu putukl'u?
Paquvha, toroqq ni myu putukl'u? Oh no, did I say that in Tamaranean or...?!
Please, talk the dirty to me--
Tell me how you would pleasure me--
Beg of me for your pleasure!
Ahh-- yes, yes, yes!
Jrlu'teph! HIja', Hiphta', Hiphta!
Whew! It has been some of the time since I have enjoyed my own fingers...
Did you enjoy that as much as I did?
This is a private thing between friends. Of course, since you just watched me pleasure myself, friends we must be now, right?
Mm... it is fun to be watched!
Who's next? Come now! Oh-- teeheheheh. I guess that is what you call the literal definition, yes?
I won! And I did not lose a hand...? At least I had started to enjoy myself...
You only had me remove my gloves!
If I were playing like everyone else, you would only have seen me in a swimsuit!
I won! ...But is this not very unsatisfying?
I suppose I could have showed off more...
It would be silly to not enjoy myself since everyone else did, yes?
That is what you think, Nami! You are not going anywhere!
Congratulations on your victory ~name~! Would you like to try florka, the traditional Tamaranian meal of victory, to celebrate?
